verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> out of the <S%H1710>fish's<s%> <S%H4480>belly,<s%> <S%H4578><s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> by reason of mine <S%H4480>affliction<s%> <S%H6869><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me; out of the <S%H4480>belly<s%> <S%H990><s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H7768>cried<s%> I, and thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

For thou hadst <S%H7993>cast<s%> me into the <S%H4688>deep,<s%> in the <S%H3824>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and the <S%H5104>floods<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4867>billows<s%> and thy <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

Then <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I am cast <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5048><s%> thy <S%H5869>sight;<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> compassed me <S%H661>about,<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> the <S%H8415>depth<s%> closed me round <S%H5437>about,<s%> the <S%H5488>weeds<s%> were <S%H2280>wrapped<s%> about my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7095>bottoms<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H1280>bars<s%> was <S%H1157>about<s%> me <S%H5769>forever:<s%> yet hast thou brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H4480>corruption,<s%> <S%H7845><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

When my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H413>into<s%> thine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

But <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto thee with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> that <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H5087>vowed.<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> is of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1709>fish,<s%> and it vomited <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land.
